overview: Miguel is dealing with depression. Trying to understand this moment, he invites Rodrigo, a friend he hasn't seen for 15 years, to his house. On the day of the meeting, Leticia, his ex-girlfriend, shows up before the guest. The unpleasant mood intensifies when Rodrigo arrives with Carla, his fiancé. Banalities briefly mask the awkwardness, but libido rises, and shyness drops as alcohol kicks in. When Leticia jokes about Miguel's sexuality, he brings back an old memory that redefines the night.
title: The Kitchen
